mapper.update:
update proxypaymessage
PHONENUMBER = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CPID = #{cpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICEID = #{serviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICENAME = #{servicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEETYPE = #{feetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNTID = #{accountid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALIDATECODE = #{validatecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERTYPE = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPID = #{spid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERORID = #{perorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGEPARTY = #{chargeparty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTENDFILED1 = #{extendfiled1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTENDFIILED2 = #{extendfiiled2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCE_TYPE = #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where GLOBALMESSAGEID = #{globalmessageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update proxypaymessage set PHONENUMBER = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CPID = #{cpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICEID = #{serviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICENAME = #{servicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEETYPE = #{feetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNTID = #{accountid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALIDATECODE = #{validatecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERTYPE = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPID = #{spid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERORID = #{perorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGEPARTY = #{chargeparty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTENDFILED1 = #{extendfiled1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTENDFIILED2 = #{extendfiiled2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE_TYPE = #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GLOBALMESSAGEID = #{globalmessageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select distinct ck.COOPER_KEY, ck.NOTIFY_URL from cooper_key ck, proxypaymessage p where ck.cooper_id = p.ACCOUNTID and p.GLOBALMESSAGEID = #{globalmessageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select mp.FEETYPE,mp.ACCOUNTID,mp.CPID,mp.PHONENUMBER,mp.PRODUCTID ,mp.SOURCE_TYPE,mp.GLOBALMESSAGEID,ck.COOPER_KEY, ck.NOTIFY_URL from cooper_key ck, proxypaymessage mp where ck.cooper_id = mp.ACCOUNTID and mp.GLOBALMESSAGEID = #{globalmessageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
